# BobSprite Col
<!--
@name: BobSprite Col
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Test if a bob is colliding with a sprite
## Parameters

- **index**: Index of the bob to test
- **index**: Index of the sprite to test the collision with
---
